ROW.DATDSC: SELECT ROWNUM, T.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT A.JIAXMC, A.NSRSBH, A.NSRMC FROM TAX_JXMC_NSRSBH_DZB A, TAX_JIAXDATA B WHERE A.JIAXMC = B.JIAXMC [%wherestr] ORDER BY A.JIAXMC ASC) T
SELECT ROWNUM,NSRMC,NSRSBH,DJXH FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ROWNUM A,NSRMC,NSRSBH,DJXH FROM DJ_NSRXX WHERE NSRMC LIKE '%[%key]%' ORDER BY NSRMC )T WHERE T.A>([%page]-1)*100 AND T.A<[%page]*100
